title: Rebeca Arellano
text: I have followed Kayla for months now, but as a broke college student, I couldn't afford the program. I was scared to be ripped off because the 80% discount seemed too good to be true. After reading these reviews, I decided to try it, and ta-daaaa! I got my pdfs immediately after I completed my purchase. They are complete pdfs, and I cannot wait to start.
